籤詩版本二:
Pono ʻoe e ʻōlelo pololei a hoʻomanaʻo ʻaʻole e ʻimi i nā mākau ʻē aʻe ma nā wahi ʻē aʻe.
Pono ʻoe e hoʻopili i kou ola kahiko, ʻaʻohe mea ʻē aʻe e maikaʻi iā ʻoe
詩意:
He hōʻailona kēia hexagram o ka mālama a me ka manawa.
ʻO ka mālama ʻana i nā mea kahiko e lawe mai i ka pōmaikaʻi.
解曰: Noho a noho. Makemake a lanakila. Mai hana i kekahi mea ʻē aʻe. E mālama wale.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua noi ʻo King Wen i ke kilokilo
Maikaʻi ka mōʻī ʻo Wen o ka mōʻī Zhou i ke kilokilo. Ua kiʻi ʻo King Zhou iā ia i kēlā manawa. Ua helu ʻo King Wen he pōʻino kēia huakaʻi a e lawe mai i ʻehiku mau makahiki pōʻino, no laila ua ʻōlelo ʻo ia i kāna keiki hiapo, ʻo Boyi, e hoʻokele iā Qi (inoa. wahi) e like me ke kānāwai a ʻaʻole e hele i waho.
Ma hope mai, ua hoʻopaʻa ʻia ʻo King Wen e ka Mōʻī Zhou ma Youli (inoa wahi).
I kēlā manawa, ua hele ke keiki hiapo a ka Mōʻī Wen e hoʻopakele i kona makuakāne, akā ua pepehi ʻia ʻo ia no ka poina ʻana i nā ʻōlelo aʻo a kona makuakāne.
聖意: ʻO ka home ponoʻī ʻaʻole maikaʻi, ʻimi i ka waiwai a me ka pōmaikaʻi, kālepa, male, keakea, Liujia alarm, Chi Tiansi, ʻelima helu, ʻeono pōʻino holoholona, ​​nalo kanaka, hoʻopiʻi lehulehu, poho, neʻe, conservativeness, nalowale waiwai, maʻi, ʻino. ma'i, e hoololiia ka halekupapau o Anshan.
古人: Ua noi ʻo King Wen i ke kilokilo
